title: Edmund Davids's Personal File
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=NOT_Edmund_Davids|caption=This is //NOT// a picture of Junior Researcher Edmund Davids.|width=300px]]

**Name:** Edmund Davids

**Clearance Level:** 02

**Staff Title:** Junior Researcher

**Current Duties:** Employed at Mobile Site-101. Doctor Milford Cogent's official research and records assistant. Also spends his time refilling Director H. Monarch's coffee cup.

**Medical Evaluation:** Passed. Jr. Res. Davids has been flagged with severe motion sickness. He has also shown signs of allergies to recently harvested wheat.

**Psychological Evaluation:** Passed. Jr. Res. Davids has expressed relief that his superiors are not "as eccentric as some people". He has not elaborated on this comment.

//Quote by Dr. Cogent: Edmund's a diligent worker. I don't have nearly enough time to write up my reports; without him, I'd be snowed under with paperwork.//

//Quote by Dir. Monarch: He's been here, what, eight months? Still can't make a good cup of coffee.//

------
[[=]]
**SCPs**

[[[SCP-8193]]] - As the Bombs Began to Fall

> //Until one of them tries to climb out of that air raid trench, the Object Class will remain "Safe".//

[[[SCP-7318]]] - Wolfpack

> An SCP-7318 pack will locate and conduct coordinated attacks on maritime vessels that possess greater than ten crew-members.

[[[SCP-7239]]] - Papal Bull(sh*t)

> UPDATE FOLLOWING INCIDENT 7239/S-23/HI: SCP-7239 is not to be handled in any way which could potentially cause it to become folded or creased.

[[[SCP-7874]]] - Checkpoint, Mate

> Traffic is to be diverted to alternate routes.

[[[SCP-7193]]] - Never Upload Your Bombers to the Cloud

> mother said planes bad

[[/=]]

------
[[=]]
**Tales**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-liar-the-bird-and-the-choice The Liar, the Bird, and the Choice]

> //I wanted so badly to be wrong.//

[[/=]]
